discussion.notes: Good change after a long time in isolation.
Lots of issues opened and closed. Big changes in the code. Frontend started, with linting, REST API and OAuth token. Demo failed.

Evaluation is very important - necessary. Ideas for survey: [SUS](https://www.usability.gov/how-to-and-tools/methods/system-usability-scale.html), pre-activity and post-activity survey on Eatwell Guide. Start writing ideas for dissertation, and ideally send a draft so that it can be further refined.
